title: HIARCS 14g Chess Openings Book [Sept 2013]
description:
============================================
 HIARCS 14g Chess Openings Book [Sept 2013]
============================================

a strong, deep chess opening book
in standard Chessbase .ctg format*

Size: 216 MB (packed), 748 MB (unpacked)

-latest update/successor to Hiarcs 13 Pro and Hiarcs 14c/d/e/f opening books
-written by Mark Uniacke (HIARCS chess engine author) and team (see hiarcs.com)
-statistics updated with latest theory to Sept 2013
-9,756,350 positions and 972,482 variations from 1,889,958 top quality games
-an increase of 1.1 million positions and +20 Elo from the 14f [June 2013] book
-may contribute more to chess strength than increases in chess engine strength
-beat the highly rated Rybka 4 book, scoring 55%+ in a 300 game match!
-adds 50 Elo points to the Hiarcs 14 chess engine vs included short book
-can be used with Hiarcs 14, your other favorite chess engines, or for reference
-requires a Chessbase graphic user interface (GUI) - Chessbase/Fritz/HIARCS/...*

Installation:
-Unpack the .7z file with 7-zip
-This gives 3 files (.ctb .ctg .cto)
-Open .ctg file with a Chessbase GUI

-------------------
 Please help seed!
-------------------
